title: Quality Control Transformation
problem: A 150-acre premium winery was losing $200K annually due to late-detected production issues and inconsistent quality control across three production lines.
approach: Deployed computer vision systems for real-time bottle inspection and ML models to predict quality issues from fermentation data, integrated with existing production management software.
impact: Reduced quality control costs by 60%, eliminated late-stage waste, and improved consistency ratings by 35% across all product lines within 6 months.
quote: The AI system caught issues we never would have seen until it was too late. It's like having a master winemaker watching every step of our process 24/7.

title: Guest Experience Revolution
problem: A boutique winery struggled to provide personalized experiences for 15,000+ annual visitors while maintaining intimate, high-touch service standards.
approach: Implemented AI-driven guest profiling, personalized tasting recommendations, and automated follow-up systems integrated with their reservation and POS platforms.
impact: Increased wine club conversion by 40%, doubled average purchase per visit, and achieved 95% guest satisfaction scores while reducing staff workload.
quote: Our guests feel like we know them personally, even on their first visit. The AI helps us deliver the intimate experience they expect from a boutique winery.
